description:
Recently we have been featuring some viewers who contacted us about being in a film.
Jase is one such viewer who inquired about being in a video with Darren. He sent a picture of himself and we were pleasantly surprised to see how attractive he is. Jase is kind of quiet, but he has nice, worked-out, jock bod. I also loved his fair skin.
The two of them were a little awkward at first. Darren is completely straight and it was his first time with another guy, so he was cracking a lot jokes in order to ease the tension. Jase got them both naked and started giving Darren a massage. In a matter of moments, Jase's face was in Darren's ass. Then Jase gave Darren a nice blowjob.
title: Blowing Darren
